name: model-eval
description: LLM evaluation tool for comparing performance across providers

scripts.heroku-postbuild: pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && pnpm run build && chmod +x bin/fix-heroku-paths.js bin/fix-heroku-client-build.js bin/fix-client-paths.js bin/ensure-assets.js && node bin/fix-heroku-paths.js && node bin/fix-client-paths.js && node bin/ensure-assets.js && node bin/fix-heroku-client-build.js
scripts.postinstall: test -d packages/client/dist || (echo 'Building client...' && cd packages/client && pnpm build)
